revised_title: Errata in Proceedings of the Royal Society of London (1873)
tldr: This issue of the Proceedings of the Royal Society of London contains corrections to the original publication, including updates to the anatomy of connective tissue, nerve, and muscle, as well as a study on the refraction of sound by the atmosphere. The issue also features an obituary notice for Archibald Smith.
scientific_discipline: 9. Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Scientific literature and publishing
